Next to the Hermitage, and walking paths. path accessible to all types of vehicles (even the largest motorhomes) with a few small holes at the start of the track. to not hear the dogs, go further. lots of places are available!!!

description: Water fountain, ideal for filling tanks (even the largest ones) with tap. we park right next to it. Located at the end of a dirt road for all types of vehicles

title: (42132) Noviercas - Calle la Marta
description: Small car park at the entrance of the village. Village pequeni almost lifeless. Without services. Next to a scale in disuse. Only for the night and rest. Tranquility

title: (26125) Villoslada de Cameros - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazingly located spot, with a cold stream and small waterfalls all around. A great place to stay (although it may be popular in the main season, we were undisturbed for the whole night - mid October). There are nice natural basins in the stream, great for a cold splash.

title: (26126) Lumbreras - 30 Calle la Solana
description: Drinking water tap, small flow however, in the small village of San André.

title: (42148) Muriel Viejo -
description: In the middle of nature. 5 km from the paved road. nice piece of relatively straight place. remnant of forestry. 4G reception. no amenities. the dirt road is good. occasional pit. last bit is a steeper bit, but every camper should be able to do this.

title: (42156) Vinuesa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the beginning of the road that goes up to the Black Lagoon, no services, beautiful surroundings, quite flat and quiet, for the busiest day

title: (42193) Valdealvillo - 17 Calle Carretera
description: Ideal to spend the nigh, very calm, swing area, basketball and soccer. Free water. There is a inn next door highly recommended for dinner, lunch or breakfast, unbeatable treatment, very good price.

title: (26533) Navajún - 55 Calle Abajo
description: Quiet parking at the entrance of the town of Navajún. Good place to park if you want to visit the pyrite mine.

title: (42157) Covaleda -
description: Fishermen's refuge. Next to a campsite. There is a fabulous bar and a very large play area… it is next to a campsite, yes.

name: Refugio De Pescadores
title: (42157) Refugio De Pescadores
description: Campsite in the countryside with very good prices for vans and mobile homes. Beautiful mountain region, "Winter Camping" started 2023 on 15.02. Better to call ahead. Pitches partly very uneven. Large wedges are necessary.

title: (26125) Villoslada de Cameros - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with shadows, water, tables and barbecues. Home to several trails. Nights are prohibited.

title: (42172) Yanguas - 1 Calle Camino del Rio
description: Parking at the entrance of Yanguas. Large. They sure do not have problems staying overnight. With park for the elderly and tables to eat.

name: Camping Los Cameros
title: (26125) Camping Los Cameros
description: Campsite in the national park, close to the little river. A lot of old mobile homes some of them are in a bad condition. Nice tourist information some kilometers before with a lot of information about hiking and other activities in the area. It’s quiet but no comfort. The way to the campsite is very nice a lot of huge birds to see.

title: (42157) Covaleda - Unnamed Road
description: Motorhome area under construction next to the swimming pools and soccer field. In the middle of nature within the largest extension of Scots pine in Europe. compact earth soil with some slope. Quiet place with wonderful views.

title: (42157) Covaleda - Camino de la Morciguilla
description: Picnic area with tables and grills on the banks of the Duero. The place is called Puente de la Arenilla. Absolute tranquility. No services.

title: (26126) Lumbreras - 62 Diseminado Lumbreras
description: An ideal place to throw the day, it has several tables and concrete seats fit quite a few cars, an ideal place to the entrance of a village.

title: (26126) Lumbreras - 2 Calle Vallejuelo
description: Picnic area of the Lumbreras chapel, you can park at the door or inside if the door is open. Picnic tables, police and services. Very calm and cool in summer, high mountain.

title: (42156) Vinuesa - Arroyo Laguna Negra (Parking de la Laguna Negra)
title_short: (42156) Vinuesa - Arroyo Laguna Negra (Parking de la Laguna Negra)
description: Parking for a visit to the Black Lagoon. Although it is a mountain road, it is accessible by motorhome. You have to pay for parking to visit, and the staff assigns you a place to do it. There are no services of any kind. Overnight or camping items are not allowed. It is recommended to go early sk it is weekend, there is a lot of hikers in good weather. Do not forget coat between September and April.

address.street: Arroyo Laguna Negra (Parking de la Laguna Negra)

title: (26126) Lumbreras - 22 Carretera Logroño
description: Parking next to the hostel, quiet, good views

title: (42172) Yanguas - 44 SO-615
description: Small stop at the edge of the water with table and path of ballad,

title: (42223) Morón de Almazán - 5 Barrio del Pilar
title_short: (42223) Morón de Almazán - 5 Barrio del Pilar
description: BBQ area and tables. The barbecues are great even to put the campsite inside, quite windy that day. Quiet place

title: (42156) Vinuesa - SO-830
description: Paved parking of the point of snow Santa Ines. Ideal to make use of the small ski resort and routes through the area.

title: (42223) Morón de Almazán - 2 Carretera Ariza
description: Flat ground parking good for parking and spending the night. It is essential to visit the monumental area and have a drink in the bar of the old schools.

title: (42005) Soria - Unnamed Road
description: Pinar Grande Interpretation Center, rope park for families with children and activities in nature

title: (26126) El Horcajo -
description: Very wide flat meadow at the top of the Sancho Leza pass (1390 m) at the entrance to the Sierra Cebollera Natural Park. Panorama, calm and solitude.

title: (26125) Villoslada de Cameros - 68B Calle Agustín Muro
title_short: (26125) Villoslada de Cameros - 68B Calle Agustín Muro
description: Very quiet place to spend the night visit the interpretation center, village and hiking trails. There is a spring to fill up with water. Keep the place clean.

title: (26125) Villoslada de Cameros -
description: Halfway between Montenegro and Villoslada de Cameros, there is a small space next to the road where we have seen a French motorhome and have decided to stop. Very quiet place to spend the day on the road. There is not much traffic to bother.

title: (42126) Miñana -
description: Corrales de Gonzalo viewpoint and recreation area, meeting place between Torlengua and Mazateron. Tranquility in the middle of Mount Torlengua. Closest services in Torlengua. Access only by 4x4 vehicle.

title: (26125) Villoslada de Cameros - Unnamed Road
description: Room for one or two campers and the truth is that the view is magnificent ... from there hiking trails to wherever you want.

title: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - 3 Avenida del Duero
title_short: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - 3 Avenida del Duero
description: At the entrance to the village, Duruelo de la Sierra

title: (42366) Berlanga de Duero - 12 SO-P-4143
description: Recreational area Fuente de la Rana (Frog Fountain) With picnic tables, barbecue (no use), fountain, shelter with fireplace and frog basin. There are no bins, so please pick up the garbage. Quiet night

title: (42220) Torlengua - 43 Calle Pajares Pilar
description: Wide esplanade outside the urban area of Torlengua, a beautiful and well-kept town with heritage and cozy corners. Meeting point and departure point for mountain biking and hiking routes. It has drinking water collection points and a bar/shop on weekends, long weekends or holidays. It also has a bio-healthy circuit, a playground, an outdoor gym and a climbing wall.

title: (26586) Enciso - Unnamed Road
description: Parking belongs to the paleontological route of Enciso

title: (42220) Torlengua - 15 Diseminado Calle Avellana
description: Drinking water fountain at the entrance of this beautiful town with nearby containers and recycling point

title: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - Calle Gerónimo Rubio
title_short: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - Calle Gerónimo Rubio
description: Parking on grass and trees next to La Caldera del Duero. Very nice bathing area. I have arrived with a 7 meter capuchin AC.

title: (26133) Ajamil -
description: Good parking area including AC, there are picnic tables by the river. Canadian step at its entrance. We slept there the night before a trail event. Small town that has public baths and a lot of charm. Perfect place to start routes to the Sierra de Cameros.

title: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
title_short: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
description: Small shelter for the night

title: (42222) Chércoles -
description: Ample meadow by the side of the road already very little frequented during the day so you can imagine what it is like at night... In the middle of fairly silent wind turbines, overlooking the "Barranco del Buey", in the scent of wild thyme, we had one of the quietest nights we have ever experienced. Not to be missed if you are in the area...

title: (26586) Enciso - Carretera de Montaña
description: Quiet and shaded place for bivouac below a small road with little traffic, on the GR at the edge of a small stream with picnic tables. No service, except trash.

title: (26586) Enciso - Carretera de Montaña
description: Quiet parking with rubbish and weekends food truk k is carried by a very nice family from the village. You can visit giant dinosaur representations and real dinosaur footprints for free

title: (26586) Enciso - Carretera de Montaña
description: Without service but an incredible 360 degree view. no light pollution for a beautiful starry night! the children of are delighted.

title: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
title_short: (42158) Duruelo de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the middle of nature, starting point for the routes to climb the Urbion peak. Arriving at Duruelo de la Sierra we take the detour to Castroviejo. After several km we turn right (following signs to Urbion peak) along an unpaved road. Perfect to rest and do routes

title: (26586) El Villar - 8 Diseminado Enciso
description: It is a parking place for the village of El Villar, right in front is located the little house of Luciana and Samuel, who sell local little things like jams and homegrown liquors. They have a tap where you can get water and the couple is very friendly. The place is full of kittens so those people who are not friendly with them refrain.

title: (26586) - 25 Diseminado Enciso
description: Parking for motorhomes and campers. Next to the bar / restaurant, the land is theirs but it is authorized by the town hall. It does not have services but there are bathrooms in the bar.

title: (26586) Enciso - LR-115
description: Ample parking, asphalted, without shade, weekend bottle with very loud music

title: (26586) - 35 Diseminado Enciso
description: Ground parking near the river and sports fields. Next to the pedestrian bridge, on the other side there is a picnic area with barbecue. Quiet area next to the theme park "Barranco Perdido", in summer, there may be a saturation for the day. Ideal for making the road of the dinosaur footprints.

title: (26586) Enciso - 76 Diseminado Enciso
description: Gravel parking at the foot of the road, ideal for visiting the Barranco Perdido park, the Virgen del Campo site and Enciso itself. Small swing park opposite.

title: (26526) Cornago - 1771 Terreno Poligono
description: Access somewhat complicated, but with care without problems for an AC of 7 meters. Spectacular views, absolute tranquility, and a step away from the castle and the church. Park in the narrowest part, parallel to the road (the widest part is used by garbage trucks or glass to make the turn). EYE! At the time of leaving, turn around, and return by the same place where you have climbed. The GPS tells you to follow the path forward, but for a motorhome it is a mousetrap (we had to go one km back to the edge of a cliff).

title: (26526) Cornago - 10 Camino de las Máquinas
description: Small parking lot at the beginning of the village. Drinking water source next to the pediment.

title: (42222) Chércoles - 7D Calle Balsa
description: Two water points close to each other, my first is a roadside fountain, my second another fountain located in an adjoining play area, both deliver clear and drinkable water in abundance.

title: (42367) Casillas de Berlanga - 15 Calle las Eras
title_short: (42367) Casillas de Berlanga - 15 Calle las Eras
description: 4 tables with stone stools.

title: (42216) Adradas - 18 Calle Carretera
description: Do not forget to visit this quiet and picturesque enclave. Walk through its streets and smile! At the exit there is a perfect area to stop and rest! And much more! Discover it !!!!

title: (26124) Ortigosa de Cameros -
description: The oak beautiful place in the middle of nature. There is a shelter and grills. The access road is very deteriorated the last 3km. But it's worth getting to. Camping is prohibited but overnight is allowed

title: (42360) Berlanga de Duero - 31P Calle Calzada
description: Picnic tables and benches.

title: (42360) Berlanga de Duero - 30P Calle Calzada
description: Set of parking football field. Perfect for visiting Berlanga and Castle. Overnight has easy and quiet access.

title: (42360) Berlanga de Duero - C. Calzada
description: New area near the sports center. There are approximately 9 squares plus the annexed area of the municipal hostel (in disuse, but the area is open). There is a lawn, trees, a fountain, a garbage container, an illuminated area and a children's playground. Peaceful and quiet. The town is also worth spending a whole day sightseeing. I'm sure it will surprise everyone who goes.

title: (26329) Viniegra de Arriba - 24 Calle Julián Hdez
title_short: (26329) Viniegra de Arriba - 24 Calle Julián Hdez
description: Beautiful mountain village Rioja, at the confluence of two rivers. only 2 places, but difficult to park between July 15 and August 15. Free WiFi town hall.

title: (26329) Viniegra de Arriba - 17 Calle Julián Hdez
title_short: (26329) Viniegra de Arriba - 17 Calle Julián Hdez
description: Perfect place to spend the night off the main road, is at the end of the street behind the wooden picnic area at the end of the playground, only 1 ac but it is worth it, river noise and cows?

title: (26526) Cornago -
description: Car park of the deposit of the keys. There are dinosaur footprints. The parking lot is sloping. Only the wind is heard. There are a couple of tables.

title: (42367) Casillas de Berlanga - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the Hermitage of San Baudelio, worth a visit, we have visited the hermitage and when it closes there is no one left, a remote and quiet place to even spend the night. There is a small fountain, but it does not state that it is drinkable. Parking and visiting is free.

title: () Monteagudo de las Vicarías - 82 CL-116
description: Small picnic spot by the roadside with picnic table. Go up the hill and you will see a beautiful lake. Windy. No service.

title: (26124) Ortigosa de Cameros - LR-232
description: On the side of the road, safe to park as it is a low bone is next door but with enough place is a fairly large asphalt and gravel Playon overlooking the rasillo reservoir we spent the whole afternoon here on January 1, 2021 very quiet there trash containers

title: (26124) Villanueva de Cameros - Unnamed Road
description: Place surrounded by nature, in a wooded area, next to a small cart. Quiet, charming place.

title: (26586) Munilla - 33 Calle Cipriano Martínez
description: Parking to visit the town and the deposits of ignites of Peñaportillo. We have been during the day.

title: (42269) Monteagudo de las Vicarías - SO-340
description: Parking in the Monteagudo reservoir, close to the town of Monteagudo de las Vicarias, quiet and with the possibility of a route around the reservoir

title: () Monteagudo de las Vicarías - Unnamed Road
title_short: () Monteagudo de las Vicarías - Unnamed Road
description: A little road goes around the lake. I used the asphaltic road, which leads to an small Spot on the side of the road. There are no services and I was there in the off-season. I came from the highway SO-340 and directly in the entree there was a Information and few parkingspots. Keep it clean.

title: (42269) Monteagudo de las Vicarías - SO-340
description: At the edge of a water reserve, in the middle of the pampas, without noise. An excellent natural site to spend the night. We bathed to cool off without worries. Perfect stop on return from vacation

title: (26124) El Rasillo de Cameros - LR-253
description: Quiet place to stay for the day only. a lot of space to park

title: (26124) El Rasillo de Cameros - LR-253
description: "Náutico el Rasillo" Club parking area. Very quiet area.

title: (26124) El Rasillo de Cameros - LR-253
description: Shaded picnic area with tables. The entrance is located in the bend in front of the parking area. When we went there the fountain did not work.

title: (26133) San Román de Cameros - LR-464
description: Very quiet place next to the river, without noise where you can spend the night very well

title: (26124) El Rasillo de Cameros - 29A Calle la Mata
title_short: (26124) El Rasillo de Cameros - 29A Calle la Mata
description: Picnic area near the town of El Rasillo. There are tables and a fountain as well as swings for children. A quiet place to spend the day.

title: (26589) Préjano - Calle Solana
description: Picnic area with lots of shade, tables and starting point for many walks and routes (green way, route to enciso ...).

title: (26124) Nieva de Cameros - LR-253
description: Parking next to the road with tables, barbecue, natural water source, container and easy access

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 148 Calle Joaquín Velasco
description: Free parking next to the Arnedillo pools. Quiet, next to the municipal swimming pools. Height limitation 2 meters. Ideal for vans, motorhomes have a very close area.

title: (26589) Antoñanzas -
description: Fairly flat place with very good views. A good place to eat or spend the night in the middle of the road. It is a road in poor condition that turns into a forest track, but a 4x4 is not necessary. Motorhomes better to refrain, but it is not impossible, the road is wide enough. There are no services, but if 4g

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 167B Avenida del Cidacos
description: The only car park in town where you can park from 9am to 9pm. The rest of the town totally forbidden to motorhomes with speed bumps. The area is difficult to access, and to only visit the town 10 euros you have to pay. Anyway you can see that they don't want us here

title: (26124) Nieva de Cameros - 1 Calle San Martín
title_short: (26124) Nieva de Cameros - 1 Calle San Martín
description: Area for several vans behind the village church. At the foot of the castle that you can climb. Nice route to the El Rasillo yacht club where you can do water sports and swim in good weather. Beautiful environment in the middle of the cameros.

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 172 Avenida del Cidacos
description:
Parking by the road through Arnedillo, at the end of town, right at the intersection of the road that goes down to the pools. Ideal to visit the thermal pools.

Drove here for the spring, the night limit is 2m for this spot we went up the hill to the paid one, careful it is steep, first gear for you rev heads and weekend warriors dont try 2nd
